title: 8 Simple Things That Leveled Up My Code
description: Coding is really enjoyable when you know how to avoid the pain points. That’s why experts have introduced best practices you can use every day. Here are 8 simple but effective concepts I’ve been using for years and thanking myself for learning them.

title: I Didn’t Even Know What a Variable Was… But I Built This
description: This story is about my very first software development experience. I’m sharing it for beginners who feel left behind or think programming isn’t for them to show that passion and curiosity can take you far, even if your first project isn’t “perfect.”
